BEFURALINE.interpretation: No depression trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications or never reached clinical stage.

ROXINDOLE.interpretation: No depression trials found. Drug may have been dropped in other indications or never reached clinical stage.

trials.title: Study to Evaluate the Effectiveness of Certain Selective Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitor (SSRI) Antidepressants During Pregnancy and Evaluate Newborn Outcomes
trials.why_stopped: Poor recruitment to experimental arms and study remained unfunded

trials.title: A Standard of Care Study of Patients With Major Depressive Disorder Who Have Had an Inadequate Response to a Selective Serotonin Reuptake/Serotonin-Norepinephrine Reuptake Inhibitor Antidepressant
12 Week Safety Trial of Flibanserin in Depressed Women Taking an SSRI or SNRI With Decreased Sexual Desire and Distress
trials.why_stopped: Study terminated by Sponsor for administrative reasons prior to completion

trials.title: Pattern Separation, Brain Derived Neurotrophic Factors, and Mechanisms of Vortioxetine
trials.why_stopped: Site was unable to reach Sponsor recruitment goals.

trials.title: Effect of SSRIs on Response to Psilocybin Therapy
Phase 2 Clinical Trial of GH001 in Postpartum Depression
trials.why_stopped: Recruitment of this patient population was more challenging than anticipated. The sponsor concluded that a sufficient amount of patients have completed the trial to demonstrate proof of concept in this patient population.

trials.title: Pharmacogenetic-Guided Antidepressant Prescribing in Adolescents

SEROTONIN.interpretation: MODERATE REPURPOSING CANDIDATE. 15 terminated trials, with 7 due to business/logistics (funding, recruitment), 0 safety concerns. Serotonin-related compounds in depression had mostly logistical failures.

trials.title: Ketamine Interleaved With Electroconvulsive Therapy for Depression
Ketamine for Severe Adolescent Depression: Intermediate-term Safety and Efficacy
trials.why_stopped: No more funding available to continue since we could not recruit throughout the pandemic.

trials.title: Preoperative Ketamine and Perioperative Depression
Ketamine for Relapse Prevention in Recurrent Depressive Disorder
Olanzapine Augmentation Therapy in Treatment-resistant Depression: a Double-blind Placebo-controlled Trial
trials.why_stopped: Study withdrawn before inclusion of first participant for administrative reasons

trials.title: Single-dose Ketamine for the Reduction of Pain and Depression in the Emergency Department
trials.why_stopped: Ketamine shortage during the funding period of the trial

trials.title: Treatment Study of Bipolar Depression
trials.why_stopped: Change in available resources for study procedures

trials.title: A Study of Olanzapine and Fluoxetine for Treatment-resistant Depression

BENZODIAZEPINE.interpretation: MODERATE REPURPOSING CANDIDATE. 14 terminated trials, 7 due to business/logistics, 1 efficacy failure, 0 safety concerns. Most failures were recruitment/funding related, especially during COVID-19 pandemic.

trials.title: Lithium for Suicidal Behavior in Mood Disorders
trials.why_stopped: terminated early due to non-safety related DMC recommendations

trials.title: Lithium Versus Paroxetine in Major Depression
Lithium Versus Paroxetine in Patients With Major Depression Who Have a Family History of Bipolar Disorder or Suicide
Trial of Ketamine and Lithium Therapy in Bipolar Depression
Combination Therapy for the Treatment of Bipolar Disorders
Simvastatin Augmentation of Lithium Treatment in Bipolar Depression
Adjunctive Isradipine for the Treatment of Bipolar Depression
Pilot Study of the Effects of Circadian Rhythms on the Treatment of Bipolar I Depression.
trials.why_stopped: This study did not receive funding

LITHIUM.interpretation: CAUTION: One safety-related termination (NCT01928446, DMC recommendations) but described as 'non-safety related'. Mixed picture: 8 business/logistics failures suggest viability, but 1 safety flag warrants deeper investigation.

summary.key_finding: SEROTONIN and BENZODIAZEPINE compounds show strong business/logistics dropout patterns in depression trials, with minimal safety concerns. LITHIUM has 1 safety flag. BEFURALINE and ROXINDOLE have no clinical trial record in depression.
